nodes.text: The dining commons were located within the Senate Building. It was in these commons that Padmé Amidala met with Rush Clovis. At the same time, Kin Robb and Onaconda Farr were having dinner together, not very far from them. Bail Organa and Jar Jar Binks were also present, along with Zinn Pauless, Dantum Roohd, and C-3PO.
